name: Dawnbreaker
title: Valora
lore: Valora, the Dawnbreaker, is the last of the Children of Light. She wields a massive hammer forged from the sun itself.

starbreaker.name: Starbreaker
starbreaker.description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer, damaging enemies and stunning those hit by the final strike.

celestialHammer.name: Celestial Hammer
celestialHammer.description: Hurls her hammer, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of fire. Can recall to teleport.

luminosity.name: Luminosity
luminosity.description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker's next attack heals herself and nearby allies.

solarGuardian.name: Solar Guardian
solarGuardian.description: Dawnbreaker flies to an ally, creating a pulsing sun that heals allies and damages enemies.
